p: In addition, univariate logistic regression analysis did not indicate a significant association between any of the baseline factors and the achievement of SVR12 in the ITT population ( Table 4). Indicatively, SVR12 rates were similar between OST and non-OST groups (79.1% and 80.7%, respectively, P>0.05) as well as between cirrhotic and non-cirrhotic subgroups (80.6% and 79.4%, respectively, P>0.05).
